name: Doomspiral
description:
"the ghost possum mini-quest"

you are Gray, whose most notable characteristic is being short and being a ghost.

you will look for your horrible piano sheets and on the way you will see some of your "friends".

all places can take you everywhere. be careful with your choices.

decipher the crumbs of history about your ancestors and about your environment.

if you can't find piano scores, ask me
